column5: Hi Folks,  I joined OFC back in October, but haven't joined in on any topics or discussion...so just to start the New Year right, I'm sayin' hello and will do a short introduction...  I live on the Ottawa River just North West of Ottawa...I target almost all species of fish, but my main species are Muskie and Trout...I caught 2 PB's in 2007 that I would like to share with you all..the first pic is a 54"x24" Muskie I caught last fall..the 2nd is a trophy Brookie caught last April  Thanks to Greencoachdog for helping me with resizing the pics!!!  FISH-ON!!
Welcome aboard and great fish indeed! Looking forward to your posts.  ps. Would you be kind enough to send me a hi-rez copy of the brookie?
Welcome!  That Brookies is a fat nasty HOG!!  If you'll join Photobucket, you'll find life to be much simpler when it comes to posting pics. No resizing and you can post a much bigger pic.
Welcome to the board & congrats on the pair of PB's, that musky is a beaut !!  The Ottawa is an awesome river  for musky & I try to get up that way every summer.  Good to have you joining us.
Welcome aboard!  I'm headin for Ottawa in 5 minutes...but guess I have to leave them big gals alone 'till June!
Welcome TMH, got some nice fish there...
Welcome to the board and keep those reports coming!!!! Nice pics BTW
Welcome aboard that shure is a couple nice PB's congratz on them

Very impressive fish there TMH, congrats on them both.  Truely is impressive ... new member and posting pics of those two monsters.  You have the envy of many and welcome aboad.   Looking forward to seeing a few more pics like that coming along in 2008.   Maybe someday, I'll join that 50" club.   I'd love to make the trip up to the Ottawa for some musky action.  I keep talking about it, but never seem to do it.   My loss of course.
That Speck is a monster, try to post a resized pic of both. Very impressive!!
Welcome!  Nice Muskie, I gotta ask, Did you catch it from a pontoon boat?
Beauty fish and Welcome aboard.
I did catch it from a pontoon yes....I was lying down on my stomach on the floor of the boat while removing the hooks from that girl while she was still in the water....what a lift that was
Wow Super Sized Brooky,  Nice
Welcome to neighborhood. Those are some beauty fish. Hope to see lots more pics of fish like that.
those are some nice fish you got there , Welcome aboard
ha - you look like Wilson from "Home Improvement" hiding behind that musky!  Nice fish!  UF
welcome to the board eh!@
welcome and congrats on your pb's
Wow! Nice fish, I am going to go up to the Ottawa river this spring for sure!
Welcome TroutnMuskieHunter  That speck is outrageous!!!  Burt
Outstanding specimans! That brookie has outgrown it's tail.... can it even swim? LOL Welcome to the board! -Brian
Wow... Nice fish....  As you can see... We love pic's...  Thanks for sharing...
